summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to and providing for the payment of certain necessary costs and expenses incurred in 1978, or unanticipated at the time of the adoption of the 1979 Budget; increasing expenditure allowances in the 1979 Budgets of various City Departments from various City Funds; establishing positions; abrogating positions; making appropriations from the Emergency Fund and declaring the Emergency therefor; and ratifying and confirming prior acts.
